chosen_as_assistant.text: Sorting files? Whoa, I've suddenly gotten this headache. I can't take it, I need a break. Well, keep at it,Doctor. This little should be a walk in the park for you, right?

talk_1.text: A job? Of course I'm all ears, let's hear it... it's not detective work? Gray zone? Haha, we don't work like that. We're fine, upstanding citizens in my establishment, I run a legitimate business.

talk_2.text: HavingWaai FuandHungaround to keep an eye on thatAakboy really saves me a broken back. I'll admit, it's shameful, but I started out babysitting these kids, and now they're all taking care of me. Honestly, youngsters are always more grown up more than we think, though that's nothing to complain about.

talk_3.text: It's thanks to your patronage that the agency is still running smoothly, give or take.Lungmen's a place with the human touch–live there long enough, and sooner or later you'll know a crowd, find the right connections. We don't like spilling blood in our line of work–always best to solve things friendly.

talk_after_elite_1_[[promotion]].text: What do you think, Dr. {nickname}? Jaye makes a mean finball, doesn't he? Old Tung taught that boy his trade and his values. It all combines for a flavor unique to Lungmen. Come on, you try now. It'll warm you up.

talk_after_elite_2_promotion.text: Under this heading, you had the third row on the left here wrong, so I patched that up, no need for thanks. Oh, do I come off very fluent? Not at all, this is still my first time accounting on a scale so small outside of the agency. Things used to be very–ah, I'm getting distracted, don't you mind.

talk_after_[[trust]]_increase_1.text: Why are the lights all on at this hour... oh? Ah, Dr. {nickname}, then. Are you still processing battle records? Well, I never thought you were such a workaholic. I'm impressed. But! You'd better turn in sooner. It's not worth it to break your body doing it.

talk_after_trust_increase_2.text: Everyone's chasing fame and profit, earning and losing, and just how many go out happily in the end? Just living a decent little life of your own's a lot to ask for. Ah, what are we all doom and gloom for? I'll go stir-fry something up, so you wait for me, Dr. {nickname}. How about a drink together?

talk_after_trust_increase_3.text: Myhexagramsays to avoid going out, so I'll pass on this mission today... what, I can't? I have to go, no two ways about it? Hah, I see. Then this is a special exception, once only! I'm lending you a hand, so dinner's on you tonight! Look, I'm all decided! This is the joint!

idle.text: Busying about can't beat a nice leisurely tea. *gulp* Dr. {nickname}, you keep some good leaves here.

introduction.text: Hello, hello there, you must be Dr. {nickname}? You've been looking after my employees for me. They haven't made trouble for you, have they? Oh, that reminds me, here's a card formy agency. Take it, go ahead.

given_[[battle_record]]s.text: How about a quick scrap? No, no, I'm just joking. I'm no good in a fight.

elite_1_promotion.text: A promotion...? There's a first for me. Feels quite fresh, too. I think times like these call for some magic words–thank you very much, boss?

elite_2_promotion.text: Life goes by in a flash. If you're always jostling for the lead, when do you stop to smell the roses? Don't think too hard about things. Enjoy the moment. No matter how paranoid you are, it'll happen if it's going to happen. And you've dealt with it, all's right with the world.

added_to_squad.text: Do I have to come along too? *Sigh*... fine, fine. Let's get going.

chosen_as_squad_leader.text: Good. Follow my instructions closely, then. Alright, everyone, dismissed–wait, hold it, don't head off for real! I was joking! Joking!

[[operation]]_start.text: It's like we're on a school trip here, eh?

an_enemy_is_about_to_spawn.text: When face to face, the "hero" prevails! Is not invariably true here at all.

selected_1.text: I'm sure you can sort them... wait, hold it. Am I up now?

selected_2.text: There, there. Put your worries to rest. I'm right here.

deployed_1.text: Hello, friends, what are we talking about?

deployed_2.text: Time for a little telling off. But not too harshly.

skill_activation_2.text: Okay, there, calm it down! You nearly spilled my tea!

skill_activation_3.text: Everyone, I implore you to just reconsider–well, no room for argument, is there?

skill_activation_4.text: *Grumble* I told you so. Don't get so worked up.

operation_cleared_(4-star).text: My thanks. It couldn't have happened without you, Dr. {nickname}... I owe you for this one. I don't forget.

operation_cleared_(3-star).text: A clean and tidy job, Dr. {nickname}. What, where was I just now? Well, I was moral support, of course. Cheered the whole time.

operation_cleared_(2-star).text: Now, now, hold it! Do not press an enemy at bay. Let them run free.

operation_failed.text: Risky, risky. There's a terrifying fortune to get. Thank goodness we run fast.

assigned_to_[[riic]].text: Dr. {nickname}? Here, take this. Decorate your room with it. Ah, but not at the head of your bed. What does it do? Haha, now that would be telling.

tap.text: If you've got something to say, say it. Hey, no bringing the hands out...

trust_tap.text: No smoking here? But this isn't a cigarette, it's white stick candy. You don't believe me? Go on, try some.

greetings.text: Welcome toLee's Detective Agency, do you have any work... oh, er? So it was you, Dr. {nickname}.
